pli-tv-pvr9:3.1: Dasa atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr9:3.2: saṃghasuṭṭhutāya, saṃghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā vinayānuggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.2: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.3: Yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.4: Yaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.5: Yaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.6: Yaṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.7: Yaṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.2: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.3: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.4: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.5: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:6.1: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:6.2: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:6.3: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:6.4: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:7.10: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:7.11: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:7.12: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:7.13: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
